title: Audio Technica Mic with XLR Male & Female Mic Cable, can I connect to Pixel 3 xl?
content: Hi, I have an Audio Technica AT2035 Condenser Microphone with Kirlin 25 feet XLR Male - XLR Female Microphone Cable, any chance to connect with my Pixel 3XL for music recording?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
